body_html:
We use github issues to track bugs and feature requests.
Questions are better suited for the forums.
BTW, there are a number of posts on the forum on how to create a new loss function, for example https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/build-your-own-loss-function-in-pytorch/235
Thanks!

body:
We use github issues to track bugs and feature requests.
Questions are better suited [for the forums](https://discuss.pytorch.org/).
BTW, there are a number of posts on the forum on how to create a new loss function, for example https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/build-your-own-loss-function-in-pytorch/235
Thanks!
